author: CMSTrackerDPG
body:
This PR fixes the ongoing race conditions with the implementation of digimorphing and introduces a new 2 buffer system of storing the status flags for pixels and doing the morphing. It also includes other fixes and optimisations in the algorithm

This PR also includes an additional functionality in the DQM plots:  fake and duplicate pixel monitoring from the digi morphing algorithm 

Monitoring plots added: 
[Monitoring_plots.pdf](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/24969369/Monitoring_plots.pdf)
[_Validation_PR.pdf](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/24969371/_Validation_PR.pdf)

Validation of the race condition fix:
[_Validation_PR.pdf](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/24969377/_Validation_PR.pdf)
title: HLT digi morphing fix
